Detailed Description

Adds a file to the web server.

Use this class to store a file into the web server. If the BrisaWebFile is stored using a BrisaWebServiceProvider, it's url path will be of "IP:PORT/SERVICENAME/yourfile". if it's stored using the BrisaWebServer convenience method "publishFile()", it's url path will be "IP:PORT/yourfile".
